Strings.Text: Moss has found a home to grow \non his diving suit.{pause}
It's a terminal which periodically \nrecords data for water {pause}{clear}temperature, water quality, and \nother useful data.{pause}
They are tools used in \nunderwater applications. {pause}{clear}Somebody was probably \nchecking the wear and tear of {pause}{clear}the parts.{pause}
It's a control terminal for the \nwater circulation near the 3rd {pause}{clear}Energy Reactor.{pause}{clear}It seems to be working normally. \nThere is no need to operate it.{pause}
There is no need to operate it \nanymore.{pause}
It's a small elevator used for \nconstruction. To operate it you {pause}{clear}need to resume power.{pause}
It's a small elevator used for \nconstruction. To operate it you {pause}{clear}need to resume power.{pause}
It's a power terminal for the \nsmall elevator used for {pause}{clear}construction.{pause}{clear}Will you turn the power on for \nthe elevator?{0x3000}
There is no need to operate it \nanymore.{pause}
